nav.div: Salem Community Schools » News » What's New » Coronavirus/COVID-19

div.img:
Attention All Salem Schools Families:
With guidance from the offices of the Governor, Indiana State and Washington County Departments of Health, Salem Schools will be closed beginning Monday March 16th.
Please click here to sign-up for meals for the week of April 20-24, 2020.
Please click here to view all COVID-19 updates from Superintendent Acton and SCS.
Please click here for information about Remote Learning and Meals.
